player.name: You
player.description: You haven´t looked at a mirror in a decade...

inventory.name: Knife
inventory.description: A small knife, used for cooking
A small vial with a weirdly gooey red substance. It smells good though.

rooms.name: Dark cave
rooms.description: This place very dark, however you can see something shiny. It looks like some kind of vial. On the other side of the cave you can see a person in a knight´s armor laying on the floor, facing the cold rugged wall.

inventory.name: Shortsword
inventory.description: A knight´s longsword. It has been through many battles as the blade seems to be dull, however the balance is still good.

characters.name: Knight
characters.introduction: You go over and try to talk to him... he doesn´t respond.. maybe he is asleep... As you try to grab his shoulder to wake him up, his head rolls right off to the floor
characters.description: A Person wearing a knight´s armor laying in the corner. Something seems wrong, maybe you can talk to him and find out what exactly it is.

inventory.description: A blue Key. Looks very valuable. Might come in handy later.

rooms.name: Clearing
rooms.description: You leave the dark cave and as soon as you get outside your eyes need to adjust to the sudden change of brightness...You are in a clearing. There are a lot of trees around you You hear a weird sound from behind you, right above the cave entrance. As if some little girl is giggling.

characters.name: Sketchy Man
characters.description: His laugh reminds you of a little kid´s, however he is at least twice as old as you.
characters.introduction: as he giggles, says he is a roaming 'businessman' and pulls out some kind of metal rods and wooden planks out of his bag (that looks way too small for what just came out of it), and presents to you his 'makeshift shop':

inventory.description: A small vial with a weirdly gooey red substance. It smells good though.

rooms.name: Woods
rooms.description: You walk into the woods and hear a lot of birds chirping in the north and hear them scutter away.

rooms.name: In Front of the cabin
rooms.description: As you run a right through a bush, you see three goblins surrounding a little girl.

inventory.description: A small vial with a weirdly gooey red substance. It smells good though.

characters.name: Little girl
characters.introduction: 'Thank you for helping me mister. These goblins knocked on the cabin door and even though my dad told me not to open the door, i did...they dragged me outside and now i can´t get back inside, since father took the only key with him', she says as she points to the east.
characters.description: A small girl, maybe 6 years old.

rooms.name: Cabin
rooms.description: A cozy place... However if only she knew

inventory.description: A small vial with a weirdly gooey red substance. It smells good though.

rooms.name: Bridge
rooms.description: A long bridge leading to some kind of castle. There seems to be a laying on the bridge about halfway through.

inventory.description: A small vial with a weirdly gooey red substance. It smells good though.

inventory.name: Demon slayer
inventory.description: The smith who crafted this sword must have been a master.

rooms.name: Castle
rooms.description: At the end of the bridge there is a huge castle.

rooms.name: Throne Room
rooms.description: As soon as you enter the throne room, you see a demon. It has long horns and skin as thick as stone.

inventory.name: Demon Club
inventory.description: A really heavy club.. actually on second sight it looks more lik another lesser demon´s skull fused with steel
A small vial with a weirdly gooey red substance. It smells good though.
A small vial with a weirdly gooey red substance. It smells good though.
A small vial with a weirdly gooey red substance. It smells good though.
